header.title: Pix4D Cloud Platform
header.tagline: Cloud platform for processing and analyzing 3D models from drone images, delivering high-precision photogrammetry with scalable cloud architecture and tools

overview.title: Project vision
overview.p1: Pix4D Cloud Platform revolutionizes photogrammetry processing with cloud-native architecture. As a frontend developer, I contributed to building a comprehensive ecosystem for processing drone imagery into high-precision 3D models and point clouds.
overview.p2: The platform addresses the need for scalable, accessible photogrammetry processing while maintaining Pix4D's industry-leading accuracy and performance standards.
overview.p3: The Matterhorn project demonstrated the platform's capabilities, processing 2,188 drone images into 300 million point clouds with 20cm ground sampling distance.
